liquibase.change.CreateIndexChange

liquibase.change.CreateIndexChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.CreateIndexChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Creates an index on an existing column.

Definition at line 20 of file CreateIndexChange.java.
